title: Pediatric Medical Skill Enhancement Simulation-Based Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Non-degree professional education for medical device companies to strengthen competencies in responding to pediatric patients.

learning_goals: Perform pediatric patient diagnosis and emergency care procedures with over 80% accuracy in a simulated environment.
Evaluate and improve communication skills in pediatric patient management using Technology-Enhanced Simulation (TES) tools.
Enhance simulation performance ability by 20% by incorporating peer feedback in a blended learning environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
